choices.A: Change the HBA name to vhba1.
choices.C: Add a secondary SAN boot target.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Should be D, boot lun should be 0

choices.C: Use the edit command to modify the job.
choices.D: Edit the job using the change command.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. The scheduled Test job fails to be reconfigured with extra configuration on Cisco 9000 Series Switch. Which action resolves the issue?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
After you define a job, you cannot modify or remove commands. To change the job, you must delete it and create a new one.

questions.question_text:
//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A Cisco UCS system fails to access the storage array. Which two actions taken on both MDS switches resolve the issue? (Choose two.)

choices.C: Configure a port channel with both interfaces as members.
choices.B: Change the switch port mode to an E port.
choices.E: Issue the no shutdown command on interface fc1/24.
choices.D: Replace the SFPs on interswitch links.

questions.question_text: An engineer is troubleshooting an unexpected blade-server reboot. One of the DIMMs is displayed inside Cisco UCS Manager as "degraded with correctable errors" but is still available for the OS to use. Which action resolves the issue?
